text: Nassarius prysmaticus is an extinct species of fossil sea snail, a marine gastropod molluscs in the family Nassariidae. Global Names IndexDiscover Life These sea snails have been found as fossils in the Pliocene deposits of Italy, Spain and the United Kingdom, as well as in the Miocene of Belgium, Denmark and Germany (from 11.608 to 2.588 Ma).Paleobiology Database ==References== Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1814
title: Nassarius prysmaticus
